ad.title: Spacious, fully furnished rooms for rent in a house with a garden in East Wall
ad.content: Located on Fairfield Avenue in the neighborhood of East Wall, this house is perfect for those who wish to live close to the city centre. The house is fully furnished, featuring four bedrooms available for rent along with a fully equipped kitchen, a living area with a back terrace and two shared bathrooms, both equipped with showers. Located on two floors, it provides plenty of space, privacy as well as storage for all your belongings. The nearby bus station enables easy access to the city centre, ideal for commuters. East Wall is also a home to shops and restaurants, as well as Dublin port. ![youtube rfEq_fp-5EI] * This house is in an ideal location for those who wish to be close to the city centre! * You will have easy access to a bus station with many bus services available. * Wood floors are featured throughout, making the house easy to clean. * The house has a cosy living area where you can watch TV and relax on the sofas. * The kitchen is fully equipped and complete with a dishwasher. * The dining area has an exit to a large terrace where you can dry your clothes and enjoy spending time outside. * Please note that smoking is only allowed in the back garden. * Property type: house * Number of bathrooms: 2 * Wi-Fi installed: yes * Wi-Fi activated: yes * Languages spoken: English * Lives on property: no * Deposit: 1 monthâ€™s rent * Payment method: cash; bank transfer * Smoking allowed: yes (in garden) * Pets permitted: no You can easily reach the city centre from the Newcomen Bridge station where you will have plenty of bus services to choose from! ![floorplan 1] ![floorplan 2]
